# 1983 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1983 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1984 for the 1983 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1983 are as follows.
